title: Mike Pesca & The Venn Diagram of America: How Sports Bridges Politics
description: Chuck talks with Mike Pesca, host of Slate's The Gist podcast, to discuss politics, the future of major league sports, and why warm weather cities will never be home to a winning football team.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
